meanings.sent1: The hempiest fabric is soft and durable.
meanings.sent2: She wore the hempiest shirt to the eco-friendly fashion show.
meanings.sent3: The hempiest backpack in the store was so popular that it sold out quickly.
meanings.sent4: His commitment to sustainability was as strong as the hempiest rope.
meanings.sent5: The hempiest rope in the garden was used to tie up the tomato plants.

meanings.sent1: The hempiest scent in the room came from the essential oil diffuser.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted a picture with the hempiest colors she could find.
meanings.sent3: The hempiest looking dog at the park turned out to be a fluffy poodle.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was as shiny and smooth as the hempiest strands of hemp.
meanings.sent5: The hempiest plant in the garden swayed gently in the breeze.
